page.title: 10Stevens Farm/Turret Farm
page.content: for milling then they sell it to Bartons bakery in Rayleigh.He has 400 acres of wheat, 6 acres of rape seed and 2 acres of potatoes. Rape seed is used to make margarine, {cooking oil,}engine oil and{diesel oil. {Turret Farm Turret Farm is a{residential farm with someone else farming the land. Mrs. Alben's husband is an engineer Originally the farm was 200 acres but now it is 27 acres.The farm has lost 173 acres to build houses.This shows the{pressure land use}is under. Mrs. Alben has 300 fish.Mrs.Alben has owned the farm for 10 year.She grows rape seed one year corn another year and barley another year.
